:size.description_zh: 阴影大小（以像素为单位）。

:offset.description: The scroll offset to show the shadow in pixels.
:offset.description_zh: 以像素为单位显示阴影的滚动偏移量。

hideScrollBar.description: Whether to hide the scrollbar or not.

isEnabled.description: Whether the shadow is enabled or not.

slots.name: base
slots.description: The base slot of the skeleton, it contains the before and after pseudo elements to create the animation.
slots.description_zh: 骨架的基本槽，它包含用于创建动画的前后伪元素。

slots.name: content
slots.description: The wrapped component to show the skeleton shape. It is visible only when the isLoaded prop is true.
slots.description_zh: 用于显示骨架形状的包装组件。仅当 isLoaded 道具为 true 时，它才可见。
